R

readIdOfExpiredObject(String) - Method in class nodebasis.ExpirationReader
 
readSuccessfulRequestId(String) - Method in interface nodebasis.RequestReader
 
Request - Class in nodebasis
The Request class is used to keep track on the time elapsed since a request message was created.
Request(int) - Constructor for class nodebasis.Request
Creates a Request object with the amount of lives the request message initially had.
request_life - Static variable in class main.SimTester
 
request_life - Static variable in class surrounding.SimTestNodeNetworkGenerator
 
request_node_count - Static variable in class main.SimTester
 
request_timestep_interval - Static variable in class main.SimTester
 
RequestMessage - Class in nodebasis
The RequestMessage class extends the Message class, and is defined by the sole purpose of fetching information regarding a specific event, on the request of a node.
RequestMessage(int, int, int, Node) - Constructor for class nodebasis.RequestMessage
Creates a RequestMessage object with the id to the sought event, the amount of lives this message should possess, the time of its creation, and the origin node as a reference.
RequestReader - Interface in nodebasis
Classes implementing this interface can be used in purpose of monitoring when a specific node retrieves an earlier sent message.
reset() - Method in class nodebasis.Node
Sets the internal node state as ready.
reviveRequest() - Method in class nodebasis.Request
Revives the request, returning it to full health.
run() - Method in class surrounding.FieldRunner
Starts a simulation on a Field.
